short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use the FindMyInvoice extension to automatically detect and save invoices from your emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beta for FindMyInvoice V2 to comply with Google API 2020  requirements.
Tag emails to view on their own page, with the extension periodically (every 30 min) checking matching emails to tag.
All data is saved on the user device.
Removing the extension will delete tagging data.
